@revhirini @gendidwight @RevHelenJacobi The reason we can't move forward on same-sex etc is largely because our structures are stuffed
@gendidwight @revhirini @RevHelenJacobi Hope other tweeps will join this conversation!
@revhirini @gendidwight @RevHelenJacobi Need this korero. My concern is if we keep going the way we are, we'll end up where we're headed!
